content: gloaming shawl is the perfect design to use a special skein of yarn the asymmetrical shape and simple pattern make it a quick and easy project even for beginners the shawl is worked in row with a simple repeat and includes a crochet chart for easy reference the soft speckled yarn creates a beautiful and versatile shawl that can be worn as a scarf or wrap the shawl can be made with one skein of light fingering/fingering weight yarn includes a crochet chart in the paid pdf **materials** 1 skein of hedgehog yarns oh so fine light fingering 100% merino yarn 465 yds/ 425 m 100g 3 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle **measurements** shawl pictured measures 68 173cm x 28 71cm after blocking
